@graph.title: Internet commerce development
@graph.abstract: "This book helps you design and implement an e-commerce Web site that is an integral part of your entire IT system using a unique methodology. Moreover, Internet Commerce Development shows you how to link the commercial side of your Internet presence with your organization's overall business strategy, so that your commercial Web site won't be just another add-on." "Packed with illustrations and the technical references you need to design, build, and implement an e-commerce solution that is a vital and well-supported function of your IT architecture, this book delivers the practical information that puts you out in front of your e-commerce competition."--Jacket
